feed.title: Category: Raiden Fighters Aces | MECHAkunEX Media Diary

entry.title: Game: Raiden Fighters Aces (X360, 2009)
entry.content:
A while ago, I bought Raiden Fighters Aces for the 360 as part of a bundle of games from the SHMUPS forum.

I played it a few times.

It is a compilation of three old shooters in the same series. There's nothing really spectacular about them and they aren't even visually fantastic. At least they aren't emulated perfectly on MAME. I doubt I'll play it many times, but I will keep it on my list in case I get shmup-desperate.
